totalEsg.description: total ESG score for the stock

highestControversy.description: highest controversy score for the stock

peerCount.description: number of peers used for peer comparison

peerGroup.description: peer group to which the stock belongs

percentile.description: total percentile compared to peer group

environmentPercentile.description: environment percentile compare to peer group

socialPercentile.description: social percentile compared to peer group

governancePercentile.description: governance percentile compared to peer group
